version 1.0.3 :

=====================================


Game Description:

Jump is newly added based on the actions that were implemented in AngerOfStick 2.
When player get to Jump, enemies will try to interrupt. Then player has to avoid or attack the enemies to go up higher.
The best score will be determined according to the height.

How to play Game:

Player has to go up higher with defeating enemies By using the buttons for Direction turn, Attack and Jump.
Also two step jump is available to climb faster.
Pipe edge can be caught by jump and player can climb with grabbing the end of pipe when he couldn't climb the pipe by jump.
Various weapons can be purchased if player get money by killing enemies.
